title: .05 How Numbers Drive The Book Industry
description: The head of one of the world's biggest book publishers talks about how data is changing the industry, from deciding to sign an author to the war with Amazon.

itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, ESPN, Jody Avirgan
